thread.title: Two dead in attack on Iran Shia worshippers: State media - Region - World
thread.title_full: Two dead in attack on Iran Shia worshippers: State media - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Two dead in attack on Iran Shia worshippers: State media - Region - World
text:
Related UN says Iran meets deadline for investigation of atomic past France says Iran missile test "worrying" violation of UN resolution Iran ready to send fighters to Syria: Senior official Two Iranian Revolutionary Guards officers killed in Syria: Media Two Iranians were killed late Friday in a shooting attack on Shia worshippers marking Ashura, one of the holiest commemorations of the faith, the official IRNA news agency reported.
Two people were also wounded in the attack in Khuzestan province in southwestern Iran, the news agency said.
